dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:8,500,000 ; (E 66°00'00"--E 95°00'00"/N 25°00'00"--N 5°00'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Date from previous call number. On verso:"43." Below bar scale:"Se vend a Amsterdam chez J. Coávens et C. Mortier." In French.
27 x 34 centimeters, on sheet 54 x 65 centimeters
